title: Ranked has the worst logic I have ever seen.
body:
I got Gold last season, big accomplishment personally.
However I went downhill in the preseason so far, and my MMR plummeted.

Now, I get matched with low silvers, as in, the game thinks my skill matches theirs.
However when I win I gain 10 points, and defeat I lose 25 points.

If the game thinks I am suppose to be matched with these players lower divisions, why do I get punished so hard for losing but barely rewarded for victory?
It is much more common to have throwaway games involving afkers/dcers/feeders etc than it is to get a good hard earned victory.
However I find I cannot climb despite playing well (I main support now with my friend and we win 9/10 bot lane... but teams are mixed in their performance).

It is now impossible for me to accomplish anything, I personally believe I am a gold tier support, but teammates be bringing me down.

TLDR; If matched with lower players, why punished for losing so damn hard for losing against them.

replies.body:
your losing more than your winning (winrate of 40%) so the system is trying to move you to an ELO where you can win more.. or have a 50/50 chance of winning.


If you want to climb, you'll have to win alot more than you lose 

50% win rate over say.. 5-15 games will stabilize your ELO
55% win rate over a further 5-10 games will see you gaining more LP then losing.

Good luck

I didn't belong in gold? I mained support inorder to keep tabs on that lane, and despite me and friend winning lane most games, team still feeds. And since I was matched with lower players I lose so many more points than everyone else.
You didnt belong in gold then. I tilted from silver 2 to silver 5 then climbed straight to gold.
